description:
Use this the tool written in GO to read various RSS feeds. Note that Atom and Reddit feeds can be parsed as well.

## usage

Create an informado.csv and add RSS URLs. Once the file has been created, one
could run:

```
./informado -date="^(2020-05-17T[1-2][7-9]|.*17 May 2020 [1-2][7-9]).*$"
```
summary: A tool to read various RSS, Atom and Reddit feeds.
